meanings.definition: The state of being silent or unable to speak.
meanings.sent1: Her muteness during the meeting made everyone curious about her thoughts.
meanings.sent2: The muteness of the library was soothing after a long day.
meanings.sent3: His sudden muteness in the middle of the conversation was quite unexpected.
meanings.sent4: The muteness of the forest at night was eerie, as if even the animals held their breath.
meanings.sent5: The muteness of the snowfall created a peaceful atmosphere in the park.

meanings.definition: The quality or condition of lacking sound or noise.
meanings.sent1: The muteness of the abandoned house added to its eerie aura.
meanings.sent2: The muteness of the desert was broken only by the occasional gust of wind.
meanings.sent3: The muteness of the empty classroom was a stark reminder of the holiday break.
meanings.sent4: The muteness of the painting seemed to amplify the emotions captured within it.
meanings.sent5: The muteness of the night sky was a canvas for the twinkling stars.
